== Request for Sponsorship for UbuntuDeveloperSummitMountainView ==

== THE DEADLINE HAS NOW PASSED. SORRY IF YOU HAVE NOT RECEIVED SPONSORSHIP THIS TIME ==

If you would like to request sponsorship, add yourself to this page. '''Requests for sponsorship closes on Mon 25th Sep 2006 at 11am UTC. Notification of those chosen for sponsorship will be notified on Mon 2nd Oct 2006.'''

To be accepted as a sponsor we expect you to actively participate in the majority of the UDS and we also expect you will be assigned responsibilities to implement ideas or specs in Edgy+1. 

Ensure you fill in the following details:

* '''Name''' - Your name
* '''Email''' - Your email address
* '''Coming From''' - Where you will be travelling from
* '''Arrival''' - Your arrival date at the summit
* '''Departure''' - Your departure date from the summit
* '''Affiliation''' - Which teams/projects you are part of
* '''Interest''' - What are your interests and what do you want to participate in at the summit?
* '''Travel Sponsor''' - Specify ''yes'' or ''no'' to indicate if you need your travel sponsoring
* '''Accom Sponsor''' - Specify ''yes'' or ''no'' to indicate if you need your accomodation sponsoring
